summary: Project includes an admin login where credentials are user-defined and can be reset by specifying a new admin username and password.
architectural_notes: Admin login credentials are created by the user and can be reset by setting a new admin username/password.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend admin login UI and session hook to accept a username and password, and call the updated backend login API accordingly. All user-facing text must be in English.

new_feature_requests.summary: Support resetting admin login credentials (set new admin username and password)
Update the backend admin credential model to store and verify a single admin username + password pair (not password-only), and update the login API to require both username and password.

Implement a backend admin-credential reset using the user-provided values: set admin username to "adminankit" and admin password to "ankits-0812" via the existing credential initialization/update mechanism, ensuring updates require a valid admin session when credentials already exist.

Persist admin credentials across canister upgrades by storing them in stable state and adding a conditional migration to preserve any existing password-only credential data (if present) by mapping it into the new username+password credential structure.
